job_descriptions: Define data strategy and architecture for the customer.
job_requirements: Requirements Min 7 to 15 years of experience in design and implementation of Bigdata Solution Experience in defining data requirement for the use case Experience define data architecture and strategy Experience in defining technology architecture to fulfill the same (fill gap if any by looking what they already have) Once data architecture and technology architecture define, drive the development of use case(s) Experience in design and implementation of solution using Hortonworks technology stack Good communication skills and proven knowledge in handling business users. Insurance domain experience/Use case implementation for insurance customer would be an added advantage

job_descriptions: Purpose of job :  Develop, communicate and implement data standards and processes to ensure quality and integrity of data assets. Ensure compliance to government data policies and regulations, as well as advise on data to be collected to serve business needs. Drive data quality culture by working with business units to define and monitor data quality metrics, analyze metrics results and conduct root cause analysis.  Main Responsibilities:  Responsible for overall management and strategy planning for data quality Set data standards across STB to ensure quality and integrity of data Develop, communicate and implement processes to be followed for data quality and metadata management Manage data integration to create a robust tourism data hub Identify common dimension tables across multiple datasets to enable data consistency and integration.  Ensure tables are up to date and meet business needs Ensure data quality metrics and performances are formally reported, internally and externally as required Work with and provide feedback to relevant business units to enhance quality of information collected Create effective awareness campaign to promote data quality excellence Implement audits for data quality
job_requirements: Requirements At least 5 years of working experience, preferably in a similar role Strong analytical and quantitative skills.  Knowledge of data quality concepts. Good communication skills Stakeholder management & Relationship building Business process management/re-engineering Possess understanding of data related government regulatory requirements Experience in communicating complex issues and data concepts

job_titles: Senior Consultant - Data Migration - AX Dynamics
job_descriptions: Responsibilities :  Provide required Data Migration support to our customers during Dynamics 365 implementation Creating and reviewing technical data migration  documentation Review Data Migration requirements/specifications in business processes and recommendations with proposed solution. Develops functional specifications and data design specifications for client engagements. Customize and configure the data according to business requirements Design, develop, review and test customized Data migration scripts using Dynamics DIXF or SSRS/SSAS data migration packages. Plan the data transformation & migration strategy Manage the data migration process, ensuring that it meets the expected deadlines for delivery Define & implement data cleansing and de-duping procedures Define & implement data validation rules and processes. Works with client personnel to identify required changes and Manages client expectations effectively if required Design and develop Data migration framework from/to D365 Operations data migration. Plan and execute mock go lives (data migration iterations) Create appropriate automation of data migration processing with D365 Operations DIXF framework. Keep update on D365 operations data migration activities. Train end users and understand  requirements from client Ability to Lead offshore & work with Onshore teams effectively in a diverse environment
job_requirements: RequirementsMandatory:   5+ years of work experience with minimum 3+years of experience with Dynamics AX 2012/D365 including data migration, is preferred Exposure to Microsoft SQL databases (SSAS/SSRS/SSIS) At least 2-3 Data migration implementations  of Dynamics AX solutions using DIXF or SSRS and SSIS Hands on Data Migration from legacy system to D365 Operations. Demonstrates strong coding skill using Dynamics AX X++ and its related technologies/tools. Experienced in AX 2012 and its latest releases D365 Operations Knowledge on Installation and configuration D365 DIXF framework. Experience in preparing Technical data Design Document, data Solution Architecture, Deployment, Operations guides, Readiness Plans Ability to map and configure business requirements into D365 Operations Engage in discussions with functional consultants. Strong experience in X++/SSRS/AIF/DIXF/Azure server managment Good knowledge of web services, SOAP, REST API services  Experience in deployment and migration using AX tools and techniques such as DMF. Ensures no deadlines of projects are slipped and takes ownership for given deadlines Expected to be flexible with time and capable of working in a Process oriented environment Excellent in written and verbal communication skills Holding relevant certifications is added advantage.

companys: MSG GLOBAL SOLUTIONS ASIA PTE. LTD.
industrys: Consulting , Banking and Finance, Information Technology
job_descriptions: Establish enterprise data architecture to meet overall needs of business Hands on experience for Design, build, and Test for large implementation project is a ‘MUST’. Integrating various tools and systems and guiding the development of enterprise data models Define standards for metadata, data administration and data lineage tracking Work through data governance activities e.g., data prioritization, business metadata definition, data quality measures and controls definition Develop and maintain data interoperability standards and interfaces Create processes for Data Life Cycle management Implement development standards and best practices for Data Warehousing and Analytics Ensure the optimal collection, organization, presentation of data, from a variety of data sources including the ERP (SAP preferred), POS, PLM, Ecommerce, social and other external sources Architect security model for appropriate data access in collaboration with Cloud/HANA data and data consumption platform architects Establish migration road map and activities for legacy and regional Data Warehouses Provide guidance and work with strategic partners/preferred vendors, infrastructure team, and other application teams to ensure proper design, development, testing and implementation of BI solutions. Strategic/ Architectural support of on-going implementation projects Facilitate Complex Issue Resolution that may arise during Implementation Participate in Training, Design, Documentation and delivery efforts in alignment with the Project Manager Willing to travel to Client Location upto 80%
job_requirements: Requirements Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related discipline/experience preferred 12-15 years working in IT with a deep understanding of software development life-cycle (SDLC) methodology 5-7 years of experience in SAP Business intelligence environment, with experience as an Architect on at least two to three successful full life-cycle global data warehouse implementation Hands-on experience in all facets of Data Architecture, Data flow strategy, Data modeling, Metadata & Master data management Experience following areas - SAP HANA architecture, HANA Modeling, HANA data provisioning, HANA views and SQL Script, SLT, Data Services, Smart Data Access Experience building applications on one of the leading cloud providers – Azure, AWS or GCP Build real-time data pipelines using Kafka, Spark, Storm, Flume, and similar stacks on leading cloud platforms Extensive experience using one of the Java, Python, R, Scala , Pig, Hive Building consumption frameworks on Hadoop, Azure or GCP (Restful services, Self-service BI) and Analytics Experience with BI reporting tools, ideally in the Business Objects suite of products, Tableau and Power BI Understanding of business processes and prior experience of implementing BI Solutions for Sales, Marketing, Supply Chain & Planning and other business functions Passionate about solving problems, Innovative, creative and an outside-the-box mindset.

job_descriptions: The Role            The Technical Consultant role is dedicated to the delivery of global services and solutions to the Hitachi Vantara enterprise customer base. The position requires an experienced technical service delivery professional to support the customer solution architecture process, providing post-sales technical expertise and advanced implementation capability in the defined practice area, which is in this case, Data Intelligence & Analytics. The Technical Consultant has responsibility for the delivery of Global Services solutions and ensuring a smooth transition from implementation to operations, whilst building customer confidence in Hitachi solutions.         Responsibilities  Providing technical subject matter expertise to troubleshoot implementation, operational, connectivity and network issues Creating detailed technical designs for Business Intelligence and data integration solutions based on a strategic analysis of the customer’s environment and requirements and using Hitachi Vantara's Pentaho development methodologies Working closely with the internal project team, third party partners and customers to implement the technical solution, educating partner and customer staff members to leverage full potential from the Pentaho product and solution features, along with building mutual support and understanding with colleagues and customers Researching and resolving installation, configuration, deployment and upgrade issues, acting as an advocate for customers the primary liaison with Engineering, Product Management and Support organizations Providing status information to Project Managers task status and completion estimates, making strong strategic decisions, based on the most relevant factors available that drive effectiveness and value to the bottom line Working closely with the Project Manager to validate whether Project completion expectations have been met, making the Project Manager aware of any deviations from the Statement of Work and highlighting customer requests that may be beyond the Statement of Work Providing rational business cases and arguments to persuade upwardly and with peers, building mutual support and understanding with colleagues and mentoring less experienced team members Developing skills and working proactively to attend prescribed training, demonstrating strong commitment to personal learning and development Identifying opportunities to gain additional skills through working collaboratively with other members of the team, demonstrating an accountability for keeping own performance on track and ensuring skills remain at the forefront of your subject matter expertise Acts an ambassador of Hitachi both on customer sites and within Global Delivery, working to simplify, improve and support innovation in order to increase efficiency, effectiveness and customer success
job_requirements: RequirementsExperience  Proven experience working with Business Intelligence and data integration tools, preferably in an agile development context Significant experience in data modeling (e.g., ER-modeling, dimensional modeling and/or data vault) Proven experience working with web and database application development tools, standards and languages including SQL, MDX, XML, Java, JSP, web services, Javascript and HTML/XSLT Solid experience working with core infrastructure technologies such as operating systems (e.g. Linux, Windows, Solaris), application servers (e.g. Tomcat, JBoss, Websphere, Weblogic), relational databases databases (e.g. DB2, Oracle, MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server), and/or column store databases (e.g., Vertica, LucidDB), security architectures (e.g. SSO, CAS, Spring Security, LDAP, Microsoft AD) and networking (e.g. HTTP/SSL/load balancing) Experience with minimally two or more data integration tools (Pentaho Data Integration, Informatica, Datastage, Talend etc.) and at least one business intelligence solution (Jaspersoft, Business Objects, Cognos, Microsoft, Microstrategy, Tibco or Oracle). Projecting confidence, expertise and passion when interacting with customers, vendors and employees at all levels in the organization A problem solver, able to work independently, organized and with strong attention to detail, demonstrating accountability by keeping performance on track Autonomously aligning personal contribution to the goals and priorities of the team and business Making strong decision-making judgments based on the most relevant factors available that drive effectiveness and value to the bottom line Must have excellent skills with English and be able to explain complex technical concepts in a clear and concise manner (additional languages preferred) A willingness to work a flexible schedule and willingness to travel

job_descriptions: In this position Senior SAP Data Migration Consultant will be responsible for participating in SAP Implementation projects handling data migration activities that include data analysis, reporting, conversion, harmonization and business-process analysis using SAP and other Enterprise Data Migration Tools. Applicant must be well experienced with SAP® in general and an expert in specific business-process areas. This position is integral in the performance of data migration activities for a specific process thread while driving communication with client SMEs and Business-Process Experts for data migration activities. This position requires only physical activity associated with office routines, as well as the ability to travel to locations within APAC region.  This is a 100% travel position. The successful candidate will be required to work at Clients sites within ANZ.
job_requirements: RequirementsBase Location:  Singapore  Qualifications:   Minimum 5 Years SAP Techno-Functional  or Functional experience; 2+ full SAP implementation lifecycle(s) Expert level business-process knowledge associated with one or more of the following SAP functional modules: FI,CO, MM, SD, PM Total (7+) years’ experience on IT projects Proficient in BackOffice CranSoft/DSP/SAP Data Services/other Data Migration tool Extensive data quality and data migration experience including proficiency in data warehousing, data analysis  and conversion planning for data migration activities 2 to 5 years Business-Process experience   Bachelor’s degree in Business, Engineering, Computer Science or other related analytical or technical disciplines, or at least four (4) years related experience Proficient in Microsoft® SQL preferred: SQL query skills, comprehensive understanding of SQL Table structure and an understanding of relational databases.     Job Responsibilities  Expert level Business Analysis on either of the following SAP modules - FI,CO, MM, SD, PM Creation and Maintenance of SAP Data Migration plan SAP Data Extraction, Transform and Load Documentation Training new recruits on the SAP Migration Toolsets

job_descriptions: - Work as Integration Consultant for the Supply Chain Transformation enabled by Kinaxis RapidResponse deployment - Work with Business, Data and Kinaxis teams to ensure that all the data requirements are fulfilled which are essential to deliver the required Supply Chain functionalities for customer - Provide subject matter expertise on the success factors needed for a successful Supply Chain transformation in connection with Kinaxis RapidResponse deployment - Coordinate with technical and business teams for development of data interfaces from SAP ECC, SAP BW, Anaplan and external partner data bases - Manage and refine the defects and issues arising out of the data interfaces with Kinaxis RapidResponse deployment
job_requirements: Requirements- Experience in Demand Planning, Supply Planning and Contract Manufacturing operations - Very strong in Kinaxis RapidResponse expertise - Experience in managing Data Integration for planning tool implementation - Experience of multi-geography based large scale supply chain transformation programs - Knowledge of ERP / Information systems  - SAP ECC, SAP BW, etc.   Interested candidates can click apply for more information. ** We regret to inform that only shortlisted candidates will be notified. ** We respect your privacy and all communication will be treated with confidentiality.  If you wish to know more about this position or explore other roles, please prepare your updated profile and get in touch with our consultants. Please note that your response to this advertisement and communications with us pursuant to this advertisement will constitute informed consent to the collection, use and/or disclosure of personal data by Manpower for the purpose of carrying out its business, in compliance with the relevant provisions of the Personal Data Protection Act 2012.

job_titles: Pre-sales Consultant - Big Data (5 days, Orchard, $5000)
job_descriptions: Pre-sales Consultant - Big Data (5 days, Orchard, $5000) Job Responsibilities  Responsible to consult and advise suitable solution in the area of analytics and related technologies Design and implement the architecture of big data that meets business requirements Create and draft scope of work for big data project Work with internal teams closely and provide proof of concept for analytics projects Prepare and conduct presentation for various projects
job_requirements: RequirementsRequirements  Minimum Degree/Diploma in Computer Science, Engineering or IT with at least 3 years of relevant experience Hands-on experience in scripting/programming Possess knowledge in Networking and Servers(Windows and Linux) Possess CEH/ECSA/CISSP/ECSA/CompTIA Security+ certification will be an added advantage Working hours: 9am - 6pm, Mondays to Fridays Salary range: $5000  We thank you for your interest in this position, applicants with relevant experience please send Microsoft word resume with expected salary to hr @machspeed.com.sgfor faster processing. job_descriptions: Company Overview Intellect Minds is a Singapore-based company since 2008, specializing in talent acquisition, application development, and training. We serve BIG MNCs and well-known clients in talent acquisition, application development, and training needs for Singapore, Malaysia, Brunei, Vietnam and Thailand. Our client is an establish company a, leader within their industry, is now looking for a Data Migration Consultant to join their esteemed organization.   Requirement:  Full Software development life cycle - Designing, development, testing, user acceptance
job_requirements: Requirements• Experience in end to end SAP data migration projects • Expertise and Experience in SAP Data services • Expertise and experience in SAP Information steward • Expertise and experience in SAP data loading methods • Expertise using SQL server tools for ETL design • Expertise using Oracle tools /TOAD for ETL design Job Duties • Identify source system architecture and data points using Computer skills and experience. • Implement Data migration framework as per data migration architecture using SAP Data services, Information steward and Microsoft SQL server. • Analyze SAP target structure in discussion the SAP functional consultant and his own SAP experience. • Conduct Mapping workshop with Client’s legacy system owners, Business analyst and SAP Functional consultants. • Create Technical Specification documents by utilizing Data migration experience and computer program knowledge which will be used in creation of Data services Jobs. • Create ETL Jobs Using Data services. • Create SQL/PL SQL Queries reconciliation statement etc. using Computer Programming Knowledge. • Review and Validate Migrated data along with client business and team take sign off.

job_titles: Senior Database Consultant - Big Data Engineer
job_descriptions: Your profile & role on the project YOU:  Thrive on challenge. When was the last time you failed? Are curious & always learning. What are you up to right now? Can deal with constant change. When were you last surprised? Have mastered at least one skill of your trade but you’re not defined by it. What can you teach us? Can you wear many hats?  YOU AGAIN: The DevOps Architect will install, maintain, and support an on-premises cloud infrastructure and apply DevOps practices and solutions. The person will also implement cloud-related and DevOps technologies such as AWS/Puppet/Chef/Elk/Azure/Openstack. Other infrastructure related activities such as maintaining the company internal server infrastructure and respond to consultant requests when required will be expected.  Install, maintain, and support on-premises and off-premises cloud stack. Configure, maintain, and support the cloud-related infrastructures. Act as a system administrator on different OSes (e.g. RHEL, Opensolaris, Ubuntu, etc.) and help teams deploy their application and automate their development and releases on the cloud. Ability to develop solutions and self-learn new tools and technologies. Document, and share knowledge on developed DevOps solutions.  STILL YOU:  Unix / Linux / Bash knowledge Very good understanding of cloud computing (e.g. Technologies, Deployment, costing, HA/DR, etc.) Good understanding of DevOps principles (e.g. testing automation, BDD, TDD, Release automation, CI/CD, etc.) 2 years experience with cloud deployment (e.g. Openstack, VMWare, AWS, Azure, Terraform, etc.) 1 year experience with testing automation (e.g. Maven, Selenium, HP QC, LoadRunner) 1 year experience with release automation process (e.g. CA-RA, Jenkins, etc.) 1 year experience with Configuration Management (e.g. Ansible, SaltStack, Puppet/Chef, etc.) 1 year experience with monitoring tools (e.g. ELK, Prometheus, Grafana and Splunk) Experience with developing and implementing processes to handle releases from Development to Operations while respecting internal rules, and offering solutions for rollback) Experience with designing an architecture to implement development-to-production workflows. Knowledge of SRE, Containers, Kubernetes, Openshift is a plus. Good understanding of microservice architecture and DevOps practices that support. Strong RDMS and NoSQL skill in deploying and fine tuning such as MySQL, Oracle, Elasticsearch.  Your role at PALO IT You will be invited to take part in R&D works done within our Practices. You will have the chance to assist or be a speaker at must-attend international IT conferences. You will have the opportunity to write articles for our Blog or specialized press. Genuine ambassador of PALO IT, you will present our offers and take an active role in the development of the company.  Your technical environment # Cloud and DevOps based technologies (AWS/Puppet/Chef/Elk/Azure/Opencloud) # DevOps practices # Linux OS, Shell Scripting, SQL # Agile and scrum environment
job_requirements: Requirements✔     You hold a Bachelor, Master or PhD degree in IT, Information Management and/or Computer Science ✔     You are just graduated or have less than 3 years of working experience ✔     Good knowledge of big data technology landscape and concepts related to distributed storage / computing ✔     Experience with big data frameworks (e.g. Hadoop, Spark) and distributions (Cloudera, Hortonworks, MapR) ✔     Experience with batch & ETL jobs to ingest and process data from multiple data sources ✔     Experience with NoSQL databases (e.g. Cassandra, MongoDB, Neo4J, ElasticSearch) ✔     Experience with querying tools (e.g Hive, Spark SQL, Impala) ✔     Experience or willingness to go in real-time stream processing, using solutions such as Kafka, Flume and/or Spark Streaming ✔     You are passionate about technology and continuous learning comes naturally to you

job_descriptions: Problem solver with curious mindset with a high execution bias having relevant work experience in Data Science in engineering domain. Data scientist with hands on expertise in building and executing analytics modules on various technology platforms including big data technology platforms. Own and complete work streams from business levers, domain know-hows and bias for execution and delivery. Be able to compile results from various work streams and be able to make coherent presentations to internal and external stakeholders. Experience in building or managing data products, high performer and problem solver. Applying best practices to manage solution implementations including code design and reviews
job_requirements: Requirements Sound knowledge of machine learning concepts. Illustrative machine learning methodologies are: 	 Bagging, Boosting, Regularization, Online Learning, One Hot Encoder etc. Statistical modeling - CHAID, CART, Regressions, SVM, SVD etc. Experience on the text analytics stack - NLP, NLU, LDA, TF-IDF etc.   Ability to communicate analytics-based insights to business stakeholders. Independent problem solver comfortable to work in an ambiguous solution space. Strong PPT Skills, Excel Demonstrated experience in delivering analytics projects in high pressure environments MS in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics or a related field with solid exposure to Machine Learning and/or Advanced Analytics with 5+ years of experience in predictive analytics and exposure to big data analytics. MBAs with relevant data science skills will also be considered. Strong understanding of the electrical engineering domain. Strong coding skills in Python is a must, and in other languages like R and SQL, Hive Sql Hands-on experience with Python libraries - NumPy, Pandas, sklearn Hands-on knowledge of working with scalable platforms for processing large and/or complex multi-source data sets using Hive, Hadoop or Spark (PySpark) is a plus. Comfortable with working on Unix, Windows and databases like Elastic Search and MongoDB Demonstrated the use of data optimization (Linear/Non-linear) to solve constrained business problems Comfortable with working on Unix, Windows and databases like Elastic Search and MongoDB

job_titles: SAP Master Data Data Governance consultant
job_descriptions: We are looking for SAP Master Data (Data Governance) Consultants.
job_requirements: RequirementsSAP Master Data consultant -   Degree in Information Technology or related fields Have at least 3 years of working exp in  Data Governance Have at least 3+ years of support exp Have regional exp  Have experience with Service Level Support Knowledge SAP SD and MM

job_descriptions: • Work with stakeholders including customers, partners and colleagues to solicit requirements, design, develop, document, manage and maintain data analytic solutions for customers or internal users; and • Support data analytics solutions pre-sales initiatives, proposal development and provide post-sales support.
job_requirements: Requirements• Degree, Master’s Degree or PhD in Computer Science/Engineering, Knowledge Engineering, Information Systems, Information Technology, Mathematics or equivalent with working experience in data analytics solutions development; and • Recognised professional or industrial certifications in relevant technologies or competencies. • In-depth technical knowledge in: - Data Modelling; - Data Mining; - Statistical Analysis; - Simulation; - Optimisation ; - Operations Research; - Descriptive, Diagnostic, Predictive & Prescriptive analytics; - Machine Learning; or Artificial Intelligence. • Technical expertise in: - Java, C/C++, Python, R , MATLAB, Scala, SQL etc. - Big data technologies e.g. Hadoop, Spark, Hive, H Base etc. • Experience in problem definition, ideation, data acquisition, mathematical modelling, testing and validation; • Experience in designing, documenting, implementing and supporting data analytics solutions; and • Experience in using software engineering best practices in development, programming, testing, version control etc.

job_titles: SAP Data Migration Architect / Senior Consultant
job_descriptions: Responsible for the Data Migration activities
job_requirements: RequirementsMinimum 10 -15 years of SAP Data Migration  At least  3-4 large scale implementations  as SAP Data Migration Architect/Senior Consultant Preferred at least 1 S4HANA implementation    Ability to manage stakeholders and Vendors Excellent communication and interpersonal skills

Requirements Strong background in the information and cyber security domain within international financial services organisations. Experience in DLP and DLP lifecycle management required Experience in leading OEM DLP products (RSA, Symantec etc.) Experience in highly complex, global, pan-bank, multi-year programmes by driving collaboration and participation by Business, Functions, Regions and countries  Candidates with following Certifications will be preferred:  CISA/CGEIT/CISM/CISSP ISO 27001 Implementer, Lead Auditor Data Privacy ITIL V3.0

job_descriptions: Looking for Fresh Graduates who are keen to do & learn SAP (System Application Product) Must have the right attitude to learn On the job training will be provided We will groom the fresh graduates into becoming a SAP Consultant
job_requirements: Requirements Must have some Information Technology background Willing to learn Determined to learn SAP
